en-AU.name: Futurice Tech Weeklies
en-AU.summary: Weekly podcast where Futurice employees share their latest thoughts about tech.
en-AU.description: Weekly podcast at Futurice where software developers from all our offices in Finland, Sweden, Norway and Germany are sharing their experience with various frameworks, languages, techniques, services and projects.
examplePhrases: Alexa, launch Tech Weeklies and play the latest episode
Alexa, ask Tech weeklies to play an episode
